entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
